feels.name: Curiosity
feels.quote: Such a portentous and mysterious monster roused all my curiosity.

feels.name: Wonder
feels.quote: But what most puzzled and confounded you was a long, limber, portentous, black mass of something hovering in the centre of the picture over three blue, dim, perpendicular lines floating in a nameless yeast.

feels.name: Awe
feels.quote: But at last all these fancies yielded to that one portentous something in the pictureâ€™s midst.

Places.name: Spouter_Inn
Places.description: A gable-ended old house, one side palsied as it were, and leaning over sadly.
